Purchased this bundle on Great Indian Sale back in January this year. Working
like charm. It was my dream for a long time, came true. Also bought 3 more
games, enjoying a lot. Go for it...

Go for 1tb one, that why I returned it. However at this prize, it's must have.

awesome. working fine no issues.

I waited so long for the official release and my patience got rewarded. Can't
wait to play horizon zero dawn, drive club and the upcoming God of war 4, red
dead redemption 2. Change your hdmi from tv settings from 1.4 to 2.0 if it
says 2160p-YUV420/RGB unsupported and it will work. Futureproof yourself and
buy the pro. It comes with a sony official seal/1 year domestic warranty and
the date of import is feb 2018(brand new product). Putting this info for those
who are skeptic about it. Happy Gaming all!  
SELLER-CLOUDTAIL INDIA(authorized by SONY) You may call sony and confirm it.  
GOT THE YELLOW PAPER DOMESTIC WARRANTY CARD(till april 2019)  
There are many reasons to buy this over any 'other' console;)  
1: EXCLUSIVES! You get amazing PS4 exclusives like Drive Club(has the best
graphics for a racing game till date and looks absolutely gorgeous in rain),
Uncharted collection, GOD OF WAR 4, Days gone etc...  
2: Games are cheaper  
Ps4 games are cheaper and easily available online and offline.  
3: Majority of India prefers ps4. So you'll find a strong online player base.  
4: You get FORTNITE BATTLE ROYALE FOR FREE. You don't even need the psplus
membership to download it.  
5: Games look gorgeous, amazon prime and you tube work like a charm. I don't
have netflix so I'll update that later. WWE Network is also there.  
If you are looking for a few extra 'teraflops' and overpriced games and no
good exclusives then you know what to do. But if you are looking for a
complete package then welcome to play station family.

get it.

card, and I bought it from cloudtail, Sony authorized seller. So I am sure
Sony has to honor the warranty.  
Amazon - dissapointed with the packing, the Amazon box was bigger than the ps4
box hence It was moving all over within the Amazon brown box. Amazon could
have done a better job. That's why 4stars.

😍I finally ordered this much-awaited item in Great Indian Sale. The price was
around 1000 less at that time. Seemed to me a nice deal as I got the Slim
version at a reasonable price with 3 games included.  
In the box I got :  
1 PS4 500 GB Slim Version (Model CUH-2008A)  
1 Dualshock 4 controller  
3 Games (Horizon Zero Dawn, Ratchet and Clank, Driveclub)  
1 Wired earphone (single earpiece)  
1 HDMI cable  
1 USB cable  
2 Power cords (Don't know why)  
Playstation Plus membership coupon for 3 months  
3 manuals  
1 Warranty card  
  
The Console :  
📺Well, it's the well-known PS4 with 500 GB of storage, fair enough for a
moderate gamer like me. Else, I rarely download games either. I find it much
comfortable to purchase the disk online. So, 500 GB will do for me.  
📺The console looks great and that's a big charm of this Slim version.  
📺The model number of this console is CUH-2008 A, which I found hard to
register on Sony.co.in as it sometimes showed some error in model number and
sometimes in serial number. I searched about this registration issue on net
and found that most of the people are unable to register their PS on Sony.
Anyway, I don't bother about it anymore.  
  
The Controller :  
🎮The controller has all the special features loaded which add to it's
attraction and added to my admiration for it. It's signature blue light looks
classic but I think it's also responsible for the battery not lasting much as
you have to charge the controller frequently. (As compared to my PS3
controller)  
🎮Anyway, the controller has a touchpad which also can be pressed and this
touchpad is very useful while writing a message, web surfing or entering
passwords on your PS4.  
🎮The R and L buttons and design of the controller have been upgraded which
results in improved accessibility as well as better grip indeed.  
🎮There is a 3.5 mm jack to connect the earphones so that the audio is diverted
to the earphones and you can play the game without disturbing anyone in the
room ! Great feature indeed !  
🎮There is a charging port also beside the 3.5 mm jack which can be used to
place the controller to a charging dock, if you have one.  
🎮A small speaker grill is also provided under the touchpad which is used for
sound output close to you.  
Graphics :  
I won't go in the technical details, but will surely assure you that the
graphics of PS4 are one of the many factors which add to the popularity of the
PS4. Of course, it will be super crispy if you connect it to 4K or FullHD TV.  
  
Misc.:  
🎮The interface of PS4 is classic and gives a Premium feel. It has many tabs
and includes many new features like Notifications and Messages from other
users as well.  
🎮The Shut down is a two step process in PS4 which looks impressive
nonetheless.  
🎮One important thing I want to quote is that PS4 does not work on inverter. If
you have a really Pure Sine-wave inverter, you are lucky. But else, you have
to look for a good quality UPS to keep your PS4 running during power cuts.  
🎮The game Driveclub (which is included with this bundle) is a superb racing
game with fantastic graphics, but I would suggest you never to connect your
PS4 to internet while playing Driveclub as it will very soon fetch a huge
update of 19 GB which will take ages to complete and the worst part is, you
won't be able to play this classic game unless you download the complete patch
! 😖  
  
Overall, I will definitely recommend this great deal to the gaming
enthusiasts. You will certainly love it !  
  
By the way, the packing of the item was not good and the carton seemed nearly
dismantled. It felt like the package had been tampered or something. Even the
PS4 packet itself was torn at the bottom corner. Though I was happy to see the
product safe and intact anyway !

Great bundle, great console. Guys don't hesitate to buy it if u don't have a

the deal it's a steal at this price.

P.S.: For those with limited internet connections, be careful. Drive Club, for
example, quietly sneaks in a nearly 20 gig download in the background.

review:
One day delivery... Packaging is great... I think best option for a
Playstation as pro requires 4k TV else slim n 4k experience is same... And
uncharted game collection is great offer for starters...

Till now no issues. Worth a buy. The dual shock controller is a joy to play.  
The only issue I faced is if you have bought a CD, then Everytime you want to
play, you need to insert the disc. I would recommend to buy the game online
and then download it.  
Also, drive club needs an update of around 19GBs initially. So be careful.

PS4 is an amazing console. As an Indian, you might want to know that many
games have around 50 gb updates and considering the Indian internet situation,
you might be put off about it. Now I think that if you play a lot of video
games and you play different genres rather than just CoD or Fifa, you SHOULD
invest in a monthly maintenance fee. Think of it as having a monthly
maintenance cost of around Rs 1500/- for a good internet connection + PSPlus
membership(you get free 3 month membership with the box, then take the annual
one).  
  
As for the games on the console, I personally think the order of great games
is PS2 > PS3 > PS4 for RPG fans (like me). There are not too many good RPGs,
let alone exclusive RPGs. Apart from all the remasters, Persona 5, FF XV
Witcher, Disgaea 5, Dragon Age Inquisition, South Park and Nier Automata are
great (most are not exclusive and you can play em on a good PC). It's a pity
that we have so few RPGs on this system compared to PS2. [On a side note: Hey
Sony, where's my Suikoden, Shin Megami Tensei, and Tales of.., on PS4?!!]  
  
I think the PSPlus is worth it for amazing games every month and playing some
multiplayer games (which also requires a good ping) like Destiny 2, Overwatch.
You don't always get amazing games for free; its a hit or a miss. But on an
average you will have a few great games.  
  
Now this particular bundle is a total steal in terms of value. Horizon is a
great looking game and Ratchet and Clank is a real treat. I don't like driving
games so I won't comment on Drive Club.

It's owesom just go for it .. The reason I gave 4 stars was that the box was
little bit damaged but it was sealed so no worries.

Delivered perfectly with 3 physical game disk, a coupon for 3 months PS plus
subscription, one ear headset, 2 power cable, Sony India Warranty card and
obviously a controller; without a scratch and sealed. ( Amazing Delivery guy
opened the pack in front of us before taking the cash. )  
  
The controller is light, have the option to connect headset which is really
cool, got touchpad (which is really useful while typing).  
  
DriveClub and Ratchet and Clank are really awesome, but Zero Horizon Down is
the real deal.  
  
P.S.: I got mine for 26430 on sale! ( Cloudtail follow Flipkart for PS4
pricing, near 7th of December there was a sell on Flipkart, so on Amazon PS4)
